description.value: Your team dashes about in a series of maneuvers that leave the enemy befuddled. Signal up to two squadmates within the aura of your commander's banner; these squadmates can Stride up to their Speed as a reaction. Each enemy they are adjacent to at any point during this movement must attempt a @Check[will|against:commander|options:inflicts:stupefied|traits:mental] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} on a critical failure); this is a mental effect.
